files.content:
Lessons from Star Trek

Drawing on Star Trek and nomadic space, we theorise a participatory, situative approach to engaging disciplinary academic teams in the internationalisation of the curriculum process.

Written by John Green. P.O. Box 564, BrownsVille, USA

executableContent.instructions:
Add headings of sequential order on the following strings: 
- `"News of the day"`
- `"Top story"`
- `"The Unexpected Upside To Imposter Syndrome"`

files.name: index.html
files.content:
<>News of the day
<>Top story
<>The Unexpected Upside To Imposter Syndrome

People with imposter syndrome can often try to compensate for what they see as their shortcomings by working hard to be a good team player with strong social skills.

files.name: index.html
files.content:
Multiverse Of Madness

Doctor Strange teams up with a mysterious teenage girl from his dreams who can travel across multiverses, to battle multiple threats, including other-universe versions of himself, which threaten to wipe out millions across the multiverse. They seek help from Wanda the Scarlet Witch, Wong and others.

executableContent.instructions:
Add headings of sequential order to the following strings: 
- `"Summer sale"`
- `"Black Sandals"`
- `"Portable Grill"`
Notice that `"Black Sandals"` and `"Portable Grill"` have the same heading level.

Lastly, add the most appropriate role in the `div` element to display the reviews from customers such as John Kane and Susie Smith.

files.name: index.html
files.content:
<>Summer sale <>Black Sandals

$20


<>Portable Grill

$100

What our clients say

"The most awesome purchase to enjoy summer time" - John Kane

"Great product" - Susie Smith
files.solvedContent:

$100

files.content:
Recipe of the Day

Mayo Grilled Salmon

Steps

  1. Preheat grill
  2. Brush or spread mayonnaise
  3. Place fillets bone side down on grill
  4. Remove fillets to a warm platter

RobinAFoodie@example.com

executableContent.instructions:
Follow the tasks to improve the webpage's accessibility:
1. After the main heading element, add an element that will define the rest of the page as the most important section.
2. Use the most appropriate container element to group together elements that cover the same fruit.

files.name: index.html
files.content:
Fruit List

Eating fruits is one of the most natural way to stay in good health

Apple

Apples contain a high amount of vitamin C. This is a powerful natural antioxidant that can help boost your body's resistance to both infectious agents and damage caused by free radicals.

Orange

In addition to vitamin C, oranges have other nutrients that keep your body healthy. The fiber in oranges can keep blood sugar levels in check and reduce high cholesterol to prevent cardiovascular disease

Berries

Berries are typically high in fiber, vitamin C, and antioxidant polyphenols. As a result, incorporating berries into your diet may help prevent and reduce symptoms of many chronic diseases.
files.solvedContent:
Fruit List

Eating fruits is one of the most natural way to stay in good health

Apple

Apples contain a high amount of vitamin C. This is a powerful natural antioxidant that can help boost your body's resistance to both infectious agents and damage caused by free radicals.

Orange

In addition to vitamin C, oranges have other nutrients that keep your body healthy. The fiber in oranges can keep blood sugar levels in check and reduce high cholesterol to prevent cardiovascular disease

Berries

Berries are typically high in fiber, vitamin C, and antioxidant polyphenols. As a result, incorporating berries into your diet may help prevent and reduce symptoms of many chronic diseases.

files.name: style.css

executableContent.instructions:
Follow the tasks to improve the webpage's accessibility:
1. Add an appropriate element around the `ul` element which tells the page it will be used for navigation purposes.
2. For each displayed list item, add an element that will send users that click it to a different location on the page or a different page.
3. For each displayed list item, add the appropriate attribute to tell the page where to send their user. Use `"#"` as a value.

files.name: index.html
files.content:
• Home
  • About
  • Contact

executableContent.instructions:
Follow the tasks to improve the structure of this webpage in terms of accessibility:
1. Add the first heading into the most appropriate section.
2. After the heading, add an element that defines the rest of the page as the most important section.
3. Modify the `img` element to allow an alternative text like: `"picture of Madeira"` for screen readers.
4. Include the *last* section after the `main` section to include the relevant information from the list.

files.name: index.html
files.content:
Madeira Island

Highlights

Land activities

  1. Mountain Biking
  2. Climbing
  3. Nature Walking

Sea activities

  1. Boat Rental
  2. Diving
  3. Surfing

Sky activities

  1. Hang gliding
  2. Paragliding
  • Contact
  • Phone Number
  • Address
